      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="en">A comparator circuit for switching on light emitting diodes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Komparatorschalting für das Einschalten 
lichtemittierende Dioden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un circuit de comparateur pour alimenter les 
diodes luminescentes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um circuito de comparador para ligar a luz que 
emite-se diodos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un circuito di comparatore per inserirsi i diodi 
luminescenti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα κύκλωμα συγκριτών για το άναμμα του φωτός που 
εκπέμπει τις διόδους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un circuito de comparador para encender (con.) 
los diodos electroluminosos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This circuit diagram shows a comparator that can switch on the red and green light emitting diodes successively, when the temperature is above and below a certain value.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">comparator circuit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">green LED</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">IC electronic circuit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Integrated circuit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Light emitting diode</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">negative temperature coefficient</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">op-amp</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">operational amplifier</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">potential divider</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">red LED</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">resistance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">switch on</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">temperature rise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Thermistor</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Schaltplan zeigt einen Komparator, der die 
roten und grünen lichtemittierenden Dioden mehrmals hintereinander 
einschalten kann, wenn die Temperatur über und unterhalb einem 
bestimmten Wert ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce schéma de circuit montre un comparateur qui 
peut alimenter les diodes luminescentes rouges et vertes 
successivement, quand la température est au-dessus et au-dessous 
d'une certaine valeur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama de circuito mostra um comparador que
possa ligar a luz vermelha e verde que se emite diodos sucessivamente,
quando a temperatura está acima e abaixo de algum valor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema circuitale mostra un comparatore che
può inserire i diodi luminescenti rossi e verdi successivamente, 
quando la temperatura è sopra e sotto certo valore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα κυκλωμάτων εμφανίζει έναν συγκριτή
που μπορεί να ανάψει το κόκκινο και πράσινο φως εκπέμποντας τις 
διόδους διαδοχικά, όταν είναι η θερμοκρασία επάνω από και κάτω
από μια ορισμένη αξία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este esquema circular muestra un comparador que 
pueda encender (con.) los diodos electroluminosos rojos y verdes 
sucesivamente, cuando la temperatura está sobre y debajo de cierto 
valor.</string>
          </description>
